detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and shall also cover the configuration options.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para:

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review process is part of the development process within JIRA. The review template can be found here [[CA050003801 SDD Review Template]] (https://eex.conti.de/ProcessWorld_Cache/Documents/CA0500038A01%20SW%20Detailed%20Design%20Review%20Template.xlsm "SDD Review Template"). The review minutes can be found here [SDD Review Results]

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of KDBit_MQB are tested automatically by a SWATT test. See links at the related functions under "Test Method". The test file of this component is - KdBit.c.test.
